Thempe

An Open Educational Resources for Learning More About Thematic Mapping

Take Me To Thempe

What is Thempe?

Thempe is an acronym of Thematic Mapping Practice and Explanation. By learning map types in Thempe you will gain more knowledge in the simplest and exciting way. Are you ready for more?
×
